info.name: Steven Universe Alone Together Tumblr Dashboard
info.description: This tumblr dash features a repeating image of an edited Steven Universe background compatible with any resolution or screen size, a pink gradient content box that disappears as you scroll, three different tumblr logos to choose from, two optional home buttons, and two related post icons. If you need something adjusted, customized, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs.
info.additionalInfo: I'll be releasing another SU dash theme that's gem drill (the cluster) inspired eventually.

options.label: Pink Alone Together Objects Post Icons
Standard content box w/ thinner width dash
